articles.title: Is it good to switch to fixed rate home loan when interest rates are moving up?
articles.description: In a floating rate loan, the borrower bears the risk if rates move up and gets rewarded when they decline. In a fixed rate loan the lender bears the risk. To compensate for this risk, lenders charge 75-100 basis points higher interest on fixed rate loans
